description: ThemelioBridgeTestInternalCalldataFFI.testVerifyHeaderDifferentialFFI(uint8) (src/test/ThemelioBridge.ffi.t.sol#265-299) has external calls inside a loop: success = bridgeTest.verifyHeader{gas: 25_000_000}(verifierHeight,header,stakeDocs,signatures) (src/test/ThemelioBridge.ffi.t.sol#290-295)
markdown: [ThemelioBridgeTestInternalCalldataFFI.testVerifyHeaderDifferentialFFI(uint8)](src/test/ThemelioBridge.ffi.t.sol#L265-L299) has external calls inside a loop: [success = bridgeTest.verifyHeader{gas: 25_000_000}(verifierHeight,header,stakeDocs,signatures)](src/test/ThemelioBridge.ffi.t.sol#L290-L295)

description:
ThemelioBridge.verifyHeader(uint256,bytes,bytes,bytes32[]) (src/ThemelioBridge.sol#390-520) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-headerEpoch = blockHeight / STAKE_EPOCH (src/ThemelioBridge.sol#401)
	-verifierHeight_ != headerEpoch * STAKE_EPOCH - 1 (src/ThemelioBridge.sol#410)
markdown:
[ThemelioBridge.verifyHeader(uint256,bytes,bytes,bytes32[])](src/ThemelioBridge.sol#L390-L520) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[headerEpoch = blockHeight / STAKE_EPOCH](src/ThemelioBridge.sol#L401)
	-[verifierHeight_ != headerEpoch * STAKE_EPOCH - 1](src/ThemelioBridge.sol#L410)

description:
ThemelioBridge._decodeInteger(bytes,uint256) (src/ThemelioBridge.sol#650-731) uses literals with too many digits:
	- integer_scope_3 = ((integer_scope_3 & 0xffffffff00000000ffffffff00000000) >> 32) | ((integer_scope_3 & 0x00000000ffffffff00000000ffffffff) << 32) (src/ThemelioBridge.sol#716-717)
